"Jude: "Mbɔbɔrhu nye asomdwee nye dɔ ndɔɔ so mma hom."
"Adɔfo
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: morobɔ mbɔdzen biara akyerɛw nkwagye a ɔyɛ hɛn nyina dze no ho asɛm abrɛ hom yi
nye James no nua no: ekehia so dɛ mekyerɛw botu hom fo dɛ
dze kɛma hɔn a wɔafrɛ hɔn: hom ndzi aper enyiberdo mma gyedzi a wɔdze maa ahotseweefo no prɛko pɛr no."

"Jude: "Osiandɛ nyimpa bi ewiawia hɔnho abɛhyɛ mu a wofi tsetse dze hɔn esi hɔ ama dɛm atsɛmbu yi
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: emumuyɛfo a woesi hɛn Nyankopɔn adom no tsir adze bɔ egyangyanbra
nye James no nua no: na wɔpow hɛn Wura kortsee a ɔno nye hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest no."

"Jude: "Na mepɛ dɛ mobɔ hom a hom nyim iyi prɛko dada yi nkaa
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: dɛ Ewuradze gyee ɔman no fii Egypt asaase do no ekyir no ɔsɛɛ hɔn a wɔanngye enndzi no."

"Jude: "Na abɔfo a wɔannkora hɔnara hɔn mpanyindzi
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: na wɔdaan hɔnankasa hɔn tsenabea gyae no
nye James no nua no: ɔdze hɔn egu daa nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu wɔ sum mu ama da kɛse no n’atsɛmbu no."

"Jude: "Dɛmara na Sodom nye Gomora nye nkurow a ɔdeda hɔn ho a wɔyɛɛ dza iyinom yɛe dze hɔnho maa ndwamansɛm dze bɔɔ mbusu kɛse no
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: wɔdze hɔn esi hɔ dɛ asɛndahɔ ama ogya a onndum da ntsea no."

"Jude: "Dɛmara so na iyinom so yɛ adaasofo a wogu honam ho fi
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: na wommbu tumdzi hwee

"Jude: "Naaso ber a ɔbɔfopanyin Maekɛl nye abɔnsam dzii esi kasakasae wɔ Moses fun ho no
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: oennsi no bo dɛ ɔyaw no bu no atsɛn

"Jude: "Na iyinom dze wɔka dza wonnyim no ho nsɛmbɔn; na dza wofi hɔn nyimpasu mu nyim no
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: dɛ mbowa a wonnyi adwen no. Na iyinom mu na wogu hɔnho fi."

"Jude: "Wondue! Osiandɛ wɔfaa Kain kwan do
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: na wɔatow hɔnho akyen wɔ Balaam mfom mu wɔ mfaso ntsi
nye James no nua no: na wɔahera dɛ Kora wɔ etuatsew mu."

"Jude: "Iyinom na wɔyɛ nkekaa wɔ hom dɔ edzidzi mu
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: wɔnye hom dzidzi
nye James no nua no: nguanhwɛfo a wonnsuro adze dɛ wɔnyɛn hɔnho
dze kɛma hɔn a wɔafrɛ hɔn: nsuwusiw a nsu nnyi mu a mframa dze hɔn kyinkyin
Egya Nyankopɔn mu adɔfo: ɔhyewber ndua a wonnyi aba a woewu mprɛnu

"Jude: "po asorɛkye dzendzenndzen a wohur hɔnara hɔn enyito pue; ekyinekyin nworaba a wɔdze sum kebikebi esie ama hɔn daa."
"Iyinom so na Enok a ofi Adam do no na otsia esuon wɔ mbasantsen mu no hyɛɛ nkɔm kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: Hwɛ
nye James no nua no: Ewuradze dze no krɔnkrɔmfo mpem du reba

"Jude: "ebobu hɔn nyina atsɛn
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: na oeyi emumuyɛfo nyina atsɛn wɔ hɔn emumuyɛdze a wɔyɛɛ nyina
nye James no nua no: nye etsirmɔdzensɛm a ɔyɛ dzen a ndzebɔnyɛfo emumuyɛfo kae dze tsiaa no nyina ho."

"Jude: "Iyinom yɛ ehwinhwimfo
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: begyabegyayɛfo a wodzi hɔnara hɔn akɔndɔ ekyir
dze kɛma hɔn a wɔafrɛ hɔn: na mfaso ntsi wɔhwɛ nyimpa enyim."

"Jude: "Na hom dze
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: adɔfo
nye James no nua no: hom nkaa nsɛm a hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest asomafo kae too hɔ no:"

"Jude: "mbrɛ wɔkaa kyerɛɛ hom dɛ
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: Ber a odzi ekyir no mu atwetwesifo bɛba a wɔbɛnantsew hɔnara hɔn emumuyɛ akɔndɔ ekyir no."

"Jude: "Iyinom nye hɔn a wɔdze mpaapaamu ba
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: honam ekyidzifo a wonnyi Sunsum no."

"Jude: "Na hom dze
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: adɔfo
nye James no nua no: hom mfa homho nsi hom gyedzi krɔnkrɔn no do mbɔ mpaa wɔ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no tum mu;"

"Jude: "hom nsie homho wɔ Nyankopɔn dɔ no mu
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: ntweɔn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest no mbɔbɔrhu nkɔ onnyiewiei nkwa mu."

"Jude: "Na binom a wohinhim no
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: hom nhu hɔn mbɔbɔr;"

"Jude: "na binom so hom nhwim hɔn mfi gya mu ngye hɔn nkwa; na binom so hom mfa suro nhu hɔn mbɔbɔr; hom nkyir nyimpasu a ɔtse dɛ atar a nkekaaba wɔ mu mpo."
"Na afei nyia obotum akora hom ma hom eemmfintsiw
Jesus Kraest n’akowaa: na ɔdze hom esi n’enyimnyam enyim dɛ hom nndzi dzɛm wɔ enyigye mbordo mu no
dze kɛma hɔn a wɔafrɛ hɔn: "Nyankopɔn kortsee a ɔnam hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest do yɛ hɛn Agyenkwa no
